profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.
products:
✓ Spray Foam (1/2 lb open cell)
✓ HFO Spray Foam (2 lb closed cell), 
✓ Cellulose (Blown and dense-pack)
✓ Fibreglass (Batts, blown and blanket wrap)
✓ Mineral Wool (Batts)
✓ Hemp (Batts)
services:
We install insulation throughout the home:
✓ Attic Insulation 
✓ Walls Insulation 
✓ Basement Insulation 
✓ Crawlspace Insulation 
✓ Garage Insulation 
✓ Floors Insulation
brands: We offer high performance, brand name insulation backed by third party warranties. Our certified installers are professionally trained to install all types of insulation.
specialities: Spray Foam Insulation, Blown Fibre Insulation, Air Barriers, Old Insulation Removal, Air Sealing & Draft Proofing, Fire Protection, Batts & Vapour Barriers, Specialty Coatings, Soundproofing, Thermal Barrier, Under Slab Insulation.

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs
products: Interior Painting,Exterior Painting,Residential Painting and Commercial Painting,Staircase refinishing, Condo or Apartment Renovations and Handyman Services, Kitchen Design and Build, Home Additions, Structural work, Garage Design and Build, Basement Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Basement Underpinning and Waterproofing,Custom Cabinetry, Flooring Installation including, Laminate, Hardwood, Engineered, Tiles, Including Porcelain, marble and granite. We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.

We Believe in not Including Paint and providing you our wholesale Paint Pricing as many of our Competitors include paint in your pricing and then substitute low grade paint. We believe in provide you the best paint for your home and to provide access to our unbelievable wholesale pricing.

profile:
K H Davis Engineering Consultants Ltd are Toronto based Structural Engineers and Home Designers specializing in Houses - Watch for us on HGTV Income Property, Leave it to Bryan, Disaster DIY.  We provide structural engineering services to homeowners, architects and builders.  KH Davis Engineering Consultants Ltd prepares building permit plans for renovation and additions to all types of houses, removing bearing walls, basement lowering, fixing problems in older homes, expert witness testimony and advocacy for homeowners dealing with construction problems.  Members of Professional Engineers of Ontario and BILD.
Structural Related Construction Services also offered through our sister company K H Davis Construction Ltd. If you need a structural engineer, please contact us today!
service_area: Greater Toronto Area primarily, but we also service clients regularly as far to the west at Kitchener Waterloo/Hamilton and as far to the east as Oshawa/Ajax, and North into the Orillia/Muskoka region.
products:
Design, Permit Plans, and Construction Services for:
- Removing Load Bearing Walls
- Basement Underpinning (lowering) Design
- Secondary dwelling units
- General Structural Engineering for all types of houses and small buildings
- Architectural design for additions, renovations, and new houses
- Structural Engineering for any type of building project - residential, commercial, industrial, institutional - but we generally don't do structural engineering for very large buildings and condominium projects - we specialize in small projects which involve some sort of structural changes to a building or a building addition.  We design many new homes each year for architects and builders.
services:
- Structural Engineering Design
- Full Building Permit plans for Part 9 Buildings - Generally having 3 stories or less, and a total square footage of less than about 1800 sq. m. ( 18,000 square feet )
- Site Visits to consult on structural problems with houses - sloping floors, cracked walls, foundation settlement problems.
- Advocacy for Homeowners who have run into problems with a construction project.
brands: Joists, Beams, LVL, Basement Apartments (Secondary Dwellings)
specialities: Our Construction group specializes in the structural aspect of house construction - this includes removing load-bearing walls and installing wood and steel beams, shear frames, underpinning basements to provide for increased headroom, stabilizing houses which have settlement problems, re-structuring homes which were not correctly designed to ensure proper structural integrity, etc.
licenses: C. of A. from Professional Engineers of Ontario, Toronto Renovators License
project_rate: Varies depending upon scope of work and travel distances
project_minimum: Varies depending upon the scope of work and travel distances
name: K H Davis Engineering Consultants Ltd

profile:
House Calls is a multi year award winner on HomeStars for good reasons.  
We pride ourselves in working closely with you and your family at all stages, including space planning, design and permitting. 
Please check out our new website too.

We help smoothly navigate the complexities of construction, while helping avoid many of the costly pitfalls that lurk in the renovation minefield.  
With years of experience and hundreds of successfully completed projects, House Calls Renovation will expertly guide you through the many challenges of your project.

If you are already involved in a difficult situation with your non-performing contractor, House Calls can help here too.  
In disputes, we have acted as Mediator for home owners, and where necessary, represented them in Court as an expert witness.

House Calls offers 1) many years of professional construction industry experience, 2) one of the highest client ratings on Home Stars, 3) several "Best Of" annual awards, 4) the successful completion of hundreds of residential projects of all types and sizes, 5) the ability to provide practical, 6) cost effective design solutions with your budget in mind, building permit drawings and permit applications to the City, and project management services during construction.

For more information, please connect with us at www.jay.charendoff@sympatico.ca  OR call: Jay Charendoff Office: 416-638-4782  Cell: 647-889-4357
services: Excellence in space planning, design, and project management to achieve both an enjoyable and high quality renovation experience.
specialities: Space planning, design, cost assessment, budgeting, contractor due diligence and selection, construction contract review, contract administration, quality monitoring, project management.
diplomas: B. Architecture, UBC; B. Science, York University;LEED Accredited Professional
memberships: LEED AP, Canadian Green Building Council, 2008
name: House Calls Renovation Advisors

profile:
Black Den Builds Inc.
Quality Construction . Design & Build

Solution based construction with your design goals in mind.
Let's work together to create the build of your dreams.
Welcome to the Den!
Dream. Design. Build.
We are a family operated construction company with over 25years experience in home and commercial builds.

Our process starts with a consultation to understand the demands of the project. We then walk you through the design and build aspects, provide a realistic and fair estimate and close each project with a final inspection to ensure you, our client, is satisfied with the work completed.

We're social here:
https://www.instagram.com/blackdenbuilds/
https://www.facebook.com/Blackdenbuilds/
services:
Services
We have an extensive network of professionals and skilled tradespeople to assist with each phase of the build. Our team is knowledgeable in the Ontario Building Code and City Bylaws ensuring your project complies to the current building standards.
Residential Renovations
Entire house remodeling, additions, accessible living solutions, waterproofing and corrective work.

Ask us how we can help!
Commercial
We've assisted with mid to high-rise construction projects and recently completed the build and addition of a restaurant.
Custom Builds
From film & television sets, to custom wall units and unique furniture pieces, we've designed and built to meet specific needs.
specialities: From Concept to Completion and everything in between.  Experienced with Permit procurement as well.
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Depends on service completed.

profile:
Reelservices provide the GTA WEST, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton and Burlington area with a complete range of contractor consulting firm services. Something you will quickly realize is that Reel Services of GTA WEST, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton, Burlington is continually striving to offer the best to our customers, achieving success through clarity and an understanding of our customers' needs. You will find what you are looking for with our contractor consulting firm services as we deliver the satisfaction that matches our strong presence in the business market. We are a member of the Eaton Certified Contractor Network. We provide services for home owners, commercial property managers and condominium owners who are looking for a turnkey contractor for their home or office renovation project.

We specialize in commercial and residential electrical services in the West Greater Toronto area. Our other services include:
Estimating, Projects & Proposals
Home Renovation Design & Consolation
Maintenance, Service & Repairs
Power Measurements, Analysis & Reports
Projects Management, Supervision & Safety Procedures
